pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Document missing data types for node stats API's response parameters
pullRequest.bodyText:
Documents missing data types for several response parameters returned
by the node stats API.
Also adds several missing human-readable parameters returned by the API.
Closes #22199. Closes #47524.

commit.message:
[DOCS] Document data types for response parameters for node stats API

Documents missing data types for several response parameters returned
by the node stats API.

Also adds several missing human-readable parameters returned by the API.

nodes.bodyText: This should be ingest.pipelines.<pipeline_id>.processors.<processor>.time since the processor object is nested under an array field. This should probably be updated for all of the processor specific stats in this reference, though that might be fine to do in a separate PR.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1316,9 +1469,13 @@ Number of compatible differences between published cluster states.
     (integer)
     Number of documents transformed by the processor.
 
+`ingest.pipelines.<pipeline_id>.<processor>.time`::
